name: The Torch Bearer (AnalogFirst)
description:
The Following game project was created with the help of the Raytown Highschool Art Club. The game's genre, name, and play were all created collaboratively and then the club split up into teams to create the project. 

All assets including art, music, and SFX were created by the students and the game was programmed/coded by me. We hope you enjoy the project and we plan to continue production throughout future school years.

This game was created to be played with a PS controller.

X = Jump

O = Flashlight

If playing with your keyboard use WASD.

W = Jump

Space = Flashlight
